projects.title: Payload to JSON
projects.description: I work as a backend engineer, I had to put the browser payload a lot of times in Postman but it took a lot of my time to format it to JSON. I started finding for converters but couldn't find one that worked for me. I decided to make my own and I'm proud of it. It's a simple tool that converts a payload to JSON.

projects.title: 3D Object Viewer
projects.description: One of the first apps I was working on my internship. I had to develop front-end implementation for app that shows 3D models of known buildings. This was also my first project in Angular framework. I've learned a lot!
